title: Four Play
description: From the author of the Internationally Bestselling Satire Word Play comes this collection of laugh-out-loud novellas, all guaranteed to curl your toes and challenge your morals.Titles include:Surrendering to Innocence(Previously published in Forbidden Fruit, Volume II)Big Balls(Previously published in Nighttides)Debating Number Ten(Previously published in Hot for Teacher)Fair Play(The brand new prequel novella to Word Play)
author: Amalie Silver
